  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_95627</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_95627</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion d'un rayon de lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Reflection of a light ray</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion eines hellen Strahls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão de um raio claro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione di un raggio luminoso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση μιας ελαφριάς ακτίνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión de un rayo ligero</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre la réflexion d'un rayon de lumière sur la surface d'un miroir. Ceci peut être utilisé comme un exercice où il faudrait ajouter une légende.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the reflection of a light ray from a mirror surface. This can be used as a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayon de lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Reflexion eines hellen 
Strahls von einer Spiegeloberfläche. Dieses kann als 
beschriftende Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a reflexão de um raio claro 
de uma superfície do espelho. Isto pode ser usado como um 
exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra la riflessione di un raggio 
luminoso da una superficie dello specchio. Ciò può essere 
usata come esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει την αντανάκλαση μιας 
ελαφριάς ακτίνας από μια επιφάνεια καθρεφτών. Αυτό μπορεί
να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra la reflexión de un rayo 
ligero de una superficie del espejo. Esto se puede utilizar como
ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heller Strahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raio claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggio luminoso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά ακτίνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθρέφτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rayo ligero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
